name: เน้นเข้าร่วม
name_original: เน้นเข้าร่วม
description:
=======================================================

The challenge that created this game is "End of the world" and create a game under a given topic within 120 hours.

The game puts you in the role of a character who searches for habitable planets.

We're new to game development so, if you liked our games. Consider following or donating. Hope you enjoy "Thank you!".

=======================================================

STORY

When the world is nearing its end Humanity must migrate to You are the leader of an expedition tasked with finding a new planet where humanity can live. For a human to be habitable, all five factors must be met, but the big problem is that there is not enough energy to travel to explore all the stars. You have to preserve humanity. Humanity is in your hands.

=======================================================

How to play

Walk: W,A,S,D 

Jump: Spacebar 

Watch Data: E

Scan: Q

Created By : เน้นเข้าร่วม!!!

=======================================================
